com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.contentassist
Class DefaultAssistState

java.lang.Object
  com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.contentassist.DefaultAssistState
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAssistState
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultAssistTagState
public class DefaultAssistState
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAssistState

This is the default implementation of the assist state information. The assist state represents how the user has triggered the content assist request. This may be post-trigger char. So the user may not have entered a trigger char but be post-trigger and therefore entering text that we should filter upon.

Author:
Oliver Tupman
